description: The demolition of 2 Elfrida Crescent, 212-218, 220, Basing House & 230 Southend Lane SE6 and the construction of 2 three/four storey buildings comprising 9 one bed and 19 two bedroom self-contained flats, 4 two bedroom and 1 three bedroom maisonettes, together with 10 two storey houses comprising 2 three bedroom and 8 four bedroom, the provision of 31 car parking spaces, associated landscaping and communal gardens.
